body:
Not a long time ago UR_NOT_WORTH_IT and Evocal made a thread like this, but it was about Senex and rendezvous.
Now... I want to ask you all, which one is your favourite Justice map?
I'm already guessing which one... xD

Mine is Justice 3 :D

(if you have seen Evocal's thread you might notice a slight similarity... Hehehe mwahahaha) and no, it isn't the idea or title.

title: Justice 1, Justice 2 or Justice 3?

replies.body:
I haven't played 3 yet, but...

Justice 1 was great (for me) because of the limited ground space, therefore I could abuse the Punch I bows and my aim to the most. It was great for kill farming, but it led to unbalanced gameplay. Still quite a good map, though.

Justice 2 was probably meant for sword fighting and larger team battles - there's a ton of space to strafe, place blocks, etc. I could see an all out war happening on this map. It's pretty awesome, and it still comes with the Punch I bows for crowd management, more consistent and rewarding bow shots, and so on.
replies.body_tagged:

It's pretty awesome, and it still comes with the Punch I bows for crowd management, more consistent and rewarding bow shots, and so on.

replies.body: justice is da best, op bows ftw :D
replies.body_tagged: justice is da best, op bows ftw :D

replies.body: Justice 3... Amazing OCN style gameplay... now avicus players need to learn how to play like ocn'ers and it will be good.
replies.body_tagged: Justice 3... Amazing OCN style gameplay... now avicus players need to learn how to play like ocn'ers and it will be good.

replies.body: Justice 2 and 3, not a fan of the original Justice since it becomes stalemate-y, and you either have to be very sneaky or skybridge to the monuments (which I personally am not a fan of doing so when I'm not in the mood to :P)
replies.body_tagged: Justice 2 and 3, not a fan of the original Justice since it becomes stalemate-y, and you either have to be very sneaky or skybridge to the monuments (which I personally am not a fan of doing so when I'm not in the mood to :P)

replies.body:
Justice 2 is the best
Justice 1 is okay
Justice is ok also, and reminds me of Race for Victory 2
replies.body_tagged:
Justice 2 is the best
Justice 1 is okay
Justice is ok also, and reminds me of Race for Victory 2

replies.body: Never played Justice 3, but out of 1 and 2, I'd have to say I like 2 more because one is quite stalematey and has a lot of spawn camping.. Despite this, they're both amazing maps :D
replies.body_tagged: Never played Justice 3, but out of 1 and 2, I'd have to say I like 2 more because one is quite stalematey and has a lot of spawn camping.. Despite this, they're both amazing maps :D

replies.body: Justice 3 is great if you ask me. If you don't get diamond right away you can start from iron and be smart to eventually get full diamond (I did it already c:) Also, the monument placement and overall gameplay of the map is perfect.

replies.body: None, they all are pretty bad.

replies.body:
Haven't played Justice 3 yet, but 1 and 2 both have their pros and cons.
Justice 1 is smaller, and its a good map for kills, but isn't easily rushed. The gameplay style feels kinda like Luar imo. I tend to just skybridge.
Justice 2 is huge, and feels more like a Rendezvous-style map. It's my favorite out of the three of them. It's easier to rush, but also great for getting kills. The monuments aren't that far away either.
